org.dannil.httpdownloader.utility

Class LanguageUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dannil.httpdownloader.utility.LanguageUtility

  • public final class LanguageUtility
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which handles operations on language bundles.
    Author:
    Daniel

    • Method Summary

      static java.util.ResourceBundle getLanguageBundle()

    • Method Detail

      • getLanguageBundle

        public static final java.util.ResourceBundle getLanguageBundle()
        Returns a bundle with the language which matches the users current display language.
        Returns:
        ResourceBundle with default language

      • getLanguageBundle

        public static final java.util.ResourceBundle getLanguageBundle(java.util.Locale language)
        Returns a bundle with the language which matches the inputed locale. If the language file doesn't exist, return a standard language (enUS).
        Parameters:
        language - - The language to load
        Returns:
        ResourceBundle with inputed locale

      • toString

        public static final java.lang.String toString(java.util.Locale language)
        Convert a locale to its IETF BCP 47 string representation.
        Parameters:
        language - - The locale to be converted
        Returns:
        A String of the locale in IETF BCP 47 language tag representation

      • toLocale

        public static final java.util.Locale toLocale(java.lang.String language)
        Convert a language string in IETF BCP 47 representation to the correct corresponding locale.
        Parameters:
        language - - The string to be converted
        Returns:
        A Locale converted from the language string
